name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable all disabled buttons and inputs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: extension enables disabled html elements, buttons,texareas, inputs and etc.  test it  https://s.codepen.io/bumbeishvili/debug/BzzYom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After installing extension, there always will be hidden button on top right. after clicking it, disabled elements will become enabled
